snippet.title: Democracy 4 Official Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Democracy 4 is the latest in the series of political strategy games by Positech Games
http://www.positech.co.uk/democracy4
Coming soon to steam (please wishlist it :D)
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410710/Democracy_4/

Democracy 4 puts the player in the position of president (or Prime Minister). The object of the game is to solve the country's problems whilst retaining the support of enough of the electorate to get re-elected each term. You have control over policies, laws and your reaction to domestic and global events. Do you have what it takes to take on the top job?
